// <auto-generated/>
// ReSharper disable InconsistentNaming

namespace ImGuiNET;

public struct ImOptionalArg<T>
{
    public bool Used;
    public T Value;
    
    public static implicit operator ImOptionalArg<T>(T value) => new() { Used = true, Value = value };
    
    public T Get(T def) => Used ? Value : def;
}
